# NSButton.BezelStyle.shadowlessSquare

**Case**

A rectangular button with no shadow, so it can abut the cells without overlapping shadows.

## Declaration

```swift
case shadowlessSquare
```

## Constants

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.texturedSquare**: A bezel style appropriate for use with textured (metal) windows.

items.description: A bezel style appropriate for use with textured (metal) windows.
items.name: NSButton.BezelStyle.texturedSquare

title: NSButton.BezelStyle.shadowlessSquare
